$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/cancel-close-tiddler
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure tiddlyflex-tiddler-is-draft-actions-draft-of-not-is-missing()
<$list filter="[list[$:/columns]!match{$:/columns!!current-column}]" variable="tiddlyFlexColumn">
	<$set name="tv-story-list" value={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<tiddlyFlexColumn>!match[$:/StoryList-]] ~[[$:/StoryList-1]] }}}>
		<%if [<tv-story-list>contains<tiddler>] %>
			<$set name="index" value={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<tiddler>add[1]] }}}>
				<$let nextTiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>zth<index>] }}} viewTiddler={{{ [<tiddler>get[draft.of]] }}}>
					<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<viewTiddler>,<nextTiddler>]"/>
					<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="-[<tiddler>]"/>
				</$let>
			</$set>
		<% endif %>
	</$set>
</$list>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-tiddler-is-draft-actions()
<% if [<tiddler>get[draft.of]!is[shadow]is[missing]] %>
	<$list filter="[list[$:/columns]!match{$:/columns!!current-column}]" variable="tiddlyFlexColumn">
		<$set name="tv-story-list" value={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<tiddlyFlexColumn>!match[$:/StoryList-]] ~[[$:/StoryList-1]] }}}>
			<%if [<tv-story-list>contains<tiddler>] %>
				<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="-[<tiddler>]"/>
			<% endif %>
		</$set>
	</$list>
<% else %>
	<<tiddlyflex-tiddler-is-draft-actions-draft-of-not-is-missing>>
	<$set name="toTiddler" value={{{ [<tiddler>get[draft.of]] }}}>
		<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-rename-tiddler" from={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<tiddler>] }}} to={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<toTiddler>] }}}/>
	</$set>
<% endif %>
<$set name="scrollTiddler" value={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<tiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<tiddler>] }}}>
	<%if [<tiddler>get[draft.of]!is[shadow]is[missing]] %>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler=<<scrollTiddler>>/>
		<%if [<scrollTiddler>is[draft]] %>
			<$set name="cssEscapedTitle" value={{{ [<scrollTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
			</$set>
		<% else %>
			<<tiddlyflex-focus-flexcontainer>>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
	<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-cancel-tiddler" $param=<<tiddler>>/>
</$set>
\end
\define actions()
<$set name="tiddler" value=<<currentTiddler>>>
	<%if [<tiddler>!is[draft]] %>
		<$let scrollTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[before<tiddler>] ~[after<tiddler>] }}}>
			<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler=<<scrollTiddler>>/>
			<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<tiddler>>/>
			<%if [<scrollTiddler>is[draft]] %>
				<$set name="cssEscapedTitle" value={{{ [<scrollTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
					<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
				</$set>
			<% else %>
				<<tiddlyflex-focus-flexcontainer>>
			<% endif %>
		</$let>
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<tiddler>] }}}/>
	<% else %>
		<<tiddlyflex-tiddler-is-draft-actions>>
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<tiddler>] }}}/>
	<% endif %>
</$set>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/column-down
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$let currentColumn={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>] :intersection[[$:/columns]get[current-column]] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-current-column-filtered>] ~1 }}} columnCount={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>last[]] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>first[]] ~1 }}} nextColumn={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>] +[before<currentColumn>] ~[<columnCount>] }}} tv-story-list={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<nextColumn>] }}} tv-history-list={{{ [[$:/HistoryList-]addsuffix<nextColumn>] }}}>
			<$set name="currentColumn" value=<<nextColumn>>>
				<<tiddlyflex-scroll-to-column>>
			</$set>
			<<tiddlyflex-cycle-columns-navigator>>
		</$let>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/edit-tiddler
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\define actions()
<%if [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[match<currentTiddler>] %>
	<%if [<currentTiddler>!is[draft]] %>
		<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<<currentTiddler>>/>
		<%if [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>!is[missing]] %>
			<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-rename-tiddler" from={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>] }}} to={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/Draft of ']addsuffix<currentTiddler>addsuffix[']] }}}/>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/filter-river
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<%if [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}!match[yes]] %>
			<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter" text="yes"/>
			<%if [{$:/temp/search/input}is[blank]match[]then[yes]] %>
				<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".tc-search input"/>
			<% endif %>
		<% else %>
			<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter"/>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/fullscreen
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\define actions()
<%if [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[match<currentTiddler>] %>
	<%if [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>!is[missing]] %>
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>] }}}/>
	<% else %>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>] }}} text="yes" column=<<currentColumn>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/move-down
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure actions()
<$set name="nextTiddler" value={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[after<currentTiddler>] }}}>
	<%if [<nextTiddler>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler<nextTiddler>]"/>
	<% endif %>
</$set>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/move-left
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure current-tiddler-is-empty-message()
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<previousStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<firstPreviousStoryTiddler>]"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<previousHistoryList>> current-tiddler=<<focusedTiddler>>/>
\end
\procedure actions()
<%if [<focusedTiddler>!is[blank]then<tv-story-list>!match[$:/StoryList-1]] %>
	<$let scrollTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] }}}>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/removing/]addsuffix<focusedTiddler>] }}} direction="left" column=<<currentColumn>>/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/adding/]addsuffix<focusedTiddler>] }}} direction="right" column={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>before<currentColumn>] }}}/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] }}}/>
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="-[<focusedTiddler>]"/>
		<%if [<previousHistoryList>get[current-tiddler]!match[]] %>
			<$set name="previousStoryFocusedTiddler" value={{{ [<previousHistoryList>get[current-tiddler]] }}}>
				<%if [<previousStoryList>contains<previousStoryFocusedTiddler>] %>
					<%if [list<previousStoryList>search:$(searchFields)$:$(searchFlags)${$:/temp/search/input}match<previousStoryFocusedTiddler>then{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>
						<$action-listops $tiddler=<<previousStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<previousStoryFocusedTiddler>]"/>
					<% elseif [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}!match[yes]] %>
						<$action-listops $tiddler=<<previousStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<previousStoryFocusedTiddler>]"/>
					<% else %>
						<$set name="firstFilteredStoryTiddler" value={{{ [list<previousStoryList>search{$:/temp/search/input}nth[1]] }}}>
							<$action-listops $tiddler=<<previousStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<firstFilteredStoryTiddler>]"/>
						</$set>
					<% endif %>
					<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<previousHistoryList>> current-tiddler=<<focusedTiddler>>/>
				<% else %>
					<<current-tiddler-is-empty-message>>
				<% endif %>
			</$set>
		<% else %>
			<<current-tiddler-is-empty-message>>
		<% endif %>
		<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/follow-current-column}match[yes]] %>
			<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/columns" current-column=<<previousStoryCounter>>/>
			<%if [<focusedTiddler>is[draft]] %>
				<$let currentColumn=<<previousStoryCounter>> cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<focusedTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
					<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
				</$let>
			<% endif %>
		<% else %>
			<$let currentTiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[list<tv-story-list>before<focusedTiddler>] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<currentTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<%if [<currentTiddler>is[draft]] %>
					<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
				<% endif %>
			</$let>
		<% endif %>
		<$let currentColumn=<<previousStoryCounter>> cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<focusedTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
			<<tiddlyflex-scroll-to-column>>
			<<tiddlyflex-scroll-to-tiddler>>
		</$let>
	</$let>
<% endif %>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-multi-column-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/move-right
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure current-tiddler-is-empty-message()
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<nextStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<firstNextStoryTiddler>]"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<nextHistoryList>> current-tiddler=<<focusedTiddler>>/>
\end
\procedure actions()
<%if [<focusedTiddler>!is[blank]then<currentColumn>!match<lastColumn>] %>
	<$let scrollTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] }}}>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/removing/]addsuffix<focusedTiddler>] }}} direction="right" column=<<currentColumn>>/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/adding/]addsuffix<focusedTiddler>] }}} direction="left" column={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>after<currentColumn>] }}}/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] }}}/>
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="-[<focusedTiddler>]"/>
		<%if [<nextHistoryList>get[current-tiddler]!match[]] %>
			<$set name="nextStoryFocusedTiddler" value={{{ [<nextHistoryList>get[current-tiddler]] }}}>
				<%if [<nextStoryList>contains<nextStoryFocusedTiddler>] %>
					<%if [list<nextStoryList>search:$(searchFields)$:$(searchFlags)${$:/temp/search/input}match<nextStoryFocusedTiddler>then{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>
						<$action-listops $tiddler=<<nextStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<nextStoryFocusedTiddler>]"/>
					<% elseif [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}!match[yes]] %>
						<$action-listops $tiddler=<<nextStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<nextStoryFocusedTiddler>]"/>
					<% else %>
						<$set name="firstStoryTiddler" value={{{ [list<nextStoryList>nth[1]] }}}>
							<$action-listops $tiddler=<<nextStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<focusedTiddler>,<firstStoryTiddler>]"/>
						</$set>
					<% endif %>
					<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<nextHistoryList>> current-tiddler=<<focusedTiddler>>/>
				<% else %>
					<<current-tiddler-is-empty-message>>
				<% endif %>
			</$set>
		<% else %>
			<<current-tiddler-is-empty-message>>
		<% endif %>
		<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/follow-current-column}match[yes]] %>
			<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/columns" current-column=<<nextStoryCounter>>/>
			<%if [<focusedTiddler>is[draft]] %>
				<$let currentColumn=<<nextStoryCounter>> cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<focusedTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
					<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
				</$let>
			<% endif %>
			<$let currentColumn=<<nextStoryCounter>> cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<focusedTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<<tiddlyflex-scroll-to-column>>
				<<tiddlyflex-scroll-to-tiddler>>
			</$let>
		<% else %>
			<$let currentTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<currentTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<%if [<currentTiddler>is[draft]] %>
					<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
				<% endif %>
			</$let>
		<% endif %>
	</$let>
<% endif %>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-multi-column-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:

	<%if [<previousTiddler>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:previousTiddler<currentTiddler>]"/>

</$set>

<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/navigate-down
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure actions-inner()
<%if [<nextTiddler>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
	<%if [<nextTiddler>is[draft]] %>
		<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
	<% else %>
		<<tiddlyflex-focus-flexcontainer>>
	<% endif %>
	<$action-navigate $to=<<nextTiddler>>/>
<% endif %>
\end
\define actions()
<%if [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>
	<$set name="focusedTiddler" value={{{ [<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]] }}}>
		<%if [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>match<focusedTiddler>] %>
			<$let nextTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>nth[1]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<nextTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<<actions-inner>>
			</$let>
		<% else %>
			<$let nextTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>nth[1]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<nextTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<<actions-inner>>
			</$let>
		<% endif %>
	</$set>
<% else %>
	<$let focusedTiddler={{{ [<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]] }}} nextTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>after<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>nth[1]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<nextTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
		<<actions-inner>>
	</$let>
<% endif %>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/navigate-up
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/navigation $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure actions-inner()
<%if [<nextTiddler>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
	<%if [<nextTiddler>is[draft]] %>
		<<tiddlyflex-focus-draft-tiddler>>
	<% else %>
		<<tiddlyflex-focus-flexcontainer>>
	<% endif %>
	<$action-navigate $to=<<nextTiddler>>/>
<% endif %>
\end
\define actions()
<%if [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>
	<$set name="focusedTiddler" value={{{ [<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]] }}}>
		<%if [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>match<focusedTiddler>] %>
			<$let nextTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>last[]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<nextTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<<actions-inner>>
			</$let>
		<% else %>
			<$let nextTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>last[]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<nextTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
				<<actions-inner>>
			</$let>
		<% endif %>
	</$set>
<% else %>
	<$let focusedTiddler={{{ [<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]] }}} nextTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>before<focusedTiddler>] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>last[]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<nextTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
		<<actions-inner>>
	</$let>
<% endif %>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-keyboard-navigator" actions=<<actions>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortcuts/remove-column
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/KeyboardShortc.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions
\procedure remove-column-actions()
<$set name="columnCount" value={{{ [list[$:/columns]count[]] }}}>
	<$list filter="[[$:/columns]get[current-column]match<columnCount>]">
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/columns" current-column={{{ [<columnCount>subtract[1]!match[0]] ~1 }}}/>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[<columnCount>!match[1]]">
		<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/columns" $subfilter="-[<columnCount>]"/>
	</$list>
</$set>
\end
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]is[blank]] %>
		<$let columns={{{ [list[$:/columns]count[]] ~1 }}}>
			<<remove-column-actions>>
		</$let>
	<% endif %>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/StartupActions.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/StartupActions/current-tiddlers
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/StartupActions.text:
\import $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/layout/functions $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/privates/selectors
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>
	<$list filter="[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>]" variable="column">
		<$let tv-story-list={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<column>!match[$:/StoryList-]] ~$:/StoryList-1 }}} tv-history-list={{{ [[$:/HistoryList-]addsuffix<column>!match[$:/HistoryList-]] ~$:/HistoryList-1 }}} currentTiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>nth[1]] }}}>
			<%if [<currentTiddler>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
				<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>/>
			<% endif %>
		</$let>
	</$list>
	<$let currentColumn={{$:/columns!!current-column}} currentStoryList={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<currentColumn>] }}} currentTiddler={{{ [list<currentStoryList>nth[1]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<currentTiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>
		<%if [<currentTiddler>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
			<$wikify name="scrollSelector" text=<<tiddlyflex-tiddler-scroll-selector>>>
				<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-scroll" selector=<<scrollSelector>>/>
			</$wikify>
		<% else %>
			<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-scroll" selector={{{ [[.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-]addsuffix<currentColumn>] }}}/>
		<% endif %>
	</$let>
<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/base.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/base
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/base.text:
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

.tc-tiddlyflex-container {
	display: flex;
	flex-flow: column;
	justify-content: flex-start;
	align-items: stretch;
	height: 100vh;
	max-height: 100vh;
	width: 100vw;
	max-width: 100vw;
	outline: none;
	overflow: clip;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-main-wrapper {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: row;
	flex-grow: 1;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-main {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: row;
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 1;
	flex-basis: 100%;
	max-height: 100%;
	max-width: 100%;
	position: relative;
}

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-main {
		-webkit-transition: max-width {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}};
		transition: max-width {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}};
	}

}

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-main {
		overflow-x: clip;
	}

}

.tc-tiddlyflex-header {
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 5px -1px <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;
	z-index: 999;
	background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-footer {
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	box-shadow: 0 -1px 5px -1px <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;
	z-index: 999;
	background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-leftbar {
	display: flex;
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	box-shadow: 1px 0 5px -1px <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;;
	z-index: 998;
	background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
}

/***************/
/* STORY RIVER */
/***************/

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	align-items: stretch;
	flex-grow: 1;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	flex-basis: 100%;
	overflow: hidden;
	max-height: 100%;
	max-width: 100%;
}

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
		-webkit-transition: flex-basis {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}}, max-width {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}};
		transition: flex-basis {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}}, max-width {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}};
	}

}

<%if [{$:/state/sidebar}!match[no]] %>

	<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/horizontal}!match[yes]] %>

		.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
			flex-basis: clamp(<<tdff.css-tiddlyflex-column-count-story-calc>>,calc(100% - max({{{ [{$:/state/sidebar/width}!is[blank]] :else[[0px]] }}},{{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}})),100%);
			max-width: 100%;
		}

	<% else %>

		.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
			flex-basis: calc(100% - {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}});
			max-width: calc(100% - {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}});
		}

	<% endif %>

<% endif %>

body.tc-resizing .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
	-webkit-transition: none;
	transition: none;
}

<%if [[$:/state/sidebar/resizing]!is[missing]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
		-webkit-transition: none;
		transition: none;
	}

<% endif %>

<%if [[$:/plugins/BTC/resizer]!is[missing]] %>

	<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/horizontal}!match[yes]] %>

		.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
			flex-basis: clamp(<<tdff.css-tiddlyflex-column-count-story-calc>>,calc(100% - {{$:/state/sidebar/width}}),100%);
			max-width: 100%;
		}

	<% else %>

		.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
			flex-basis: calc(100% - {{$:/state/sidebar/width}});
			max-width: calc(100% - {{$:/state/sidebar/width}});
			min-width: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/min-width}};
		}

	<% endif %>

<% endif %>

<%if [{$:/state/sidebar}match[no]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container {
		flex-basis: 100%;
		max-width: 100%;
	}

<% endif %>

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container-inner {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: row;
	justify-content: flex-start;
	align-items: stretch;
	max-height: 100%;
	flex-grow: 1;
	flex-shrink: 0;
}

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-container-inner {
		overflow: hidden;
		flex-basis: 0;
	}

}

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	flex-grow: 1;
	overflow: hidden;
	z-index: 500;
	flex-basis: 100%;
}

<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/horizontal}!match[yes]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper {
		flex-shrink: 1;
		flex-grow: 0;
	}

<% endif %>

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper:not(:last-of-type) {
		border-right: 1px solid <<colour very-muted-foreground>>;
	}

}

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper-inner {
	flex-grow: 1;
	flex-shrink: 1;
	overflow-y: auto;
	scroll-behavior: smooth;
	z-index: 600;
	outline: none;
}

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper-inner {
		flex-basis: 0;
	}

}

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper .tc-tiddler-frame {
	width: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 0;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/box-shadow-spread}} <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;
	box-shadow: 0 0 {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/box-shadow-spread}} <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-wrapper-inner .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river {
	padding: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}};
	min-height: 100%;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > .tc-tiddler-view-frame, .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > .tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
	margin-bottom: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/margin-bottom}};
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river .tc-navigating .tc-tiddler-frame {
	outline: 2px dashed <<colour primary>>;
}

/***********/
/* SIDEBAR */
/***********/

.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar {
	position: relative;
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	align-items: stretch;
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	max-height: 100%;
	z-index: 998;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px <<colour tiddlyflex-box-shadow>>;
}

<%if [{$:/state/sidebar}match[no]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar-container {
		pointer-events: none !important;
	}

<% endif %>

@media (min-width: 992px) {

	.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar {
		width: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}};
		-webkit-transition: box-shadow {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}};
		transition: box-shadow {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}};
	}

}

<%if [[$:/plugins/BTC/resizer]!is[missing]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar {
		width: max({{$:/state/sidebar/width}},{{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}});
	}

<% endif %>

<%if [{$:/state/sidebar}match[no]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar {
		-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px transparent;
		box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px transparent;
	}

<% endif %>

.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar-container {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	justify-content: flex-start;
	align-items: stretch;
	max-height: 100%;
	flex-grow: 1;
	flex-shrink: 0;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar-container-inner {
	display: flex;
	flex-grow: 1;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	overflow-y: auto;
	scroll-behavior: smooth;
	flex-basis: 0;
	flex-direction: row;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar-scrollable {
	padding-top: 42px;
	padding-left: 42px;
	min-width: 100%;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar-shown-eventcatcher {
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
	-webkit-touch-callout: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-khtml-user-select: none;
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
}

.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar-hide {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	right: 0;
	width: 100vw;
	height: 100vh;
	background: 0 0;
	visibility: hidden;
	z-index: 1000;
	cursor: pointer;
	-webkit-transition: background {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms, visibility 0s calc(2 * {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms);
	transition: background {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms, visibility 0s calc(2 * {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms);
}

/******************/
/* ACTIVE COLUMNS */
/******************/

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-active {
	background: repeating-linear-gradient(
		to right,
		<<colour page-background>>,
		<<colour page-background>> 10px,
		<<colour tiddler-background>> 10px,
		<<colour tiddler-background>> 20px
	);
}

<%if [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-active {
		background: repeating-linear-gradient(
			to bottom,
			<<colour page-background>>,
			<<colour page-background>> 10px,
			<<colour tiddler-background>> 10px,
			<<colour tiddler-background>> 20px
		);
	}

<% endif %>

.tc-tiddlyflex-activate-column {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	height: 100%;
	cursor: default;
	background-color: transparent;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
	-webkit-touch-callout: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-khtml-user-select: none;
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
}

/*************/
/* DROPZONES */
/*************/

div[class^="tc-tiddlyflex-dropzone-"] {
	min-height: 100%;
	position: relative;
}

div[class^="tc-tiddlyflex-dropzone-"].tc-dragover:before {
	z-index: 999;
	display: block;
	position: sticky;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	background: <<colour dropzone-background>>;
	text-align: center;
	content: "<<lingo DropMessage>>";
}

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/columns.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/columns-sidebar

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/current.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/current-tiddler
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/current.text:
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	<$let currentColumn={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>] :intersection[{$:/columns!!current-column}] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-current-column-filtered>] }}} historyList={{{ [[$:/HistoryList-]addsuffix<currentColumn>!match[$:/HistoryList-]] ~[[$:/HistoryList-1]] }}}>

		<$set name="cssEscapedTitle" value={{{ [<historyList>get[current-tiddler]escapecss[]] }}}>

			<<tiddlyflex-style-current-tiddler>>

		</$set>

		<$list filter="[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>] +[!match<currentColumn>]" variable="column">

			<$let historyList={{{ [[$:/HistoryList-]addsuffix<column>!match[$:/HistoryList-]] ~[[$:/HistoryList-1]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<historyList>get[current-tiddler]escapecss[]] }}}>

				<<tiddlyflex-style-unfocused-tiddlers>>

			</$let>

		</$list>

	</$let>

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/menu.text:
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	@media (min-width: 992px) {

		.tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
			display: none;
		}

		<%if [[$:/state/sidebar/posx]is[missing]] %>

			.tc-tiddler-controls >  button:not(.tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow) {
				display: inline;
			}

			.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
				display: none;
			}

		<% endif %>

		<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/horizontal}!match[yes]] %>

			<$list filter="[{$:/state/sidebar}match[no]] :then[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>count[]compare:number:gteq{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint}] :else[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>count[]compare:number:gteq{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar}]" variable="column">

				.tc-tiddlyflex-column-<<column>> .tc-tiddler-controls >  button:not(.tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow) {
					display: none;
				}

				.tc-tiddlyflex-column-<<column>> .tc-tiddler-controls .tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
					display: block;
				}

			</$list>

		<% endif %>

		<%if [[$:/state/sidebar/posx]!is[missing]] %>

			<$vars sidebarWidthPixels={{{ [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}removesuffix[px]] }}} sidebarWidthPercentage={{{ [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width}removesuffix[%]] }}} drag-diff={{$:/state/sidebar/posx!!drag-diff}} selectednodeWidth={{$:/state/sidebar/posx!!selectednode-width}} containerWidth={{$:/state/sidebar/posx!!widgetnode-width}} columnCount={{{ [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/horizontal}!match[yes]] :then[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>count[]] ~1 }}} minStoryWidth={{{ [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/min-width}removesuffix[px]] }}} leftbarWidth={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/LeftToolbar]limit[1]] :then[{$:/state/sidebar/posx!!leftbar-width}] ~0 }}}>

				<%if [<sidebarWidthPixels>!is[blank]!match[]] %>

					<$let viewportWidth={{$:/state/DynaView/ViewportDimensions/Width}} containerWidth={{{ [<viewportWidth>!is[blank]subtract<leftbarWidth>] ~[<containerWidth>] }}}>

						<$let originalStoryContainerWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<sidebarWidthPixels>] }}} originalSingleColumnWidth={{{ [<originalStoryContainerWidth>divide<columnCount>] }}} sidebarResizerWidth={{{ [<selectednodeWidth>divide[2]] }}} gripDiff={{{ [<sidebarResizerWidth>subtract<drag-diff>] }}} minStoryContainerWidth={{{ [<minStoryWidth>multiply<columnCount>] }}} sidebarWidthMax={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<minStoryContainerWidth>] }}} sidebarWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract{$:/state/sidebar/posx}add<gripDiff>compare:number:lteq<sidebarWidthPixels>then<sidebarWidthPixels>] ~[<containerWidth>subtract{$:/state/sidebar/posx}add<gripDiff>compare:number:gteq<sidebarWidthMax>then<sidebarWidthMax>] ~[<containerWidth>subtract{$:/state/sidebar/posx}add<gripDiff>] }}} maxStoryContainerWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<sidebarWidthPixels>] }}} storyContainerWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<sidebarWidth>compare:number:gteq<minStoryContainerWidth>] ~[<minStoryContainerWidth>] }}} singleColumnWidth={{{ [<storyContainerWidth>divide<columnCount>compare:number:gt<minStoryWidth>] ~[<minStoryWidth>] }}} narrowWidthWhenSidebarShown={{{ [<originalStoryContainerWidth>divide{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar}compare:number:gteq<minStoryWidth>] ~[<minStoryWidth>multiply{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar}divide<columnCount>] }}}>

							<%if [<singleColumnWidth>compare:number:lteq<narrowWidthWhenSidebarShown>] %>

								.tc-tiddler-controls > button:not(.tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow) {
									display: none;
								}

								.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
									display: block;
								}

							<% endif %>

						</$let>

					</$let>

				<% elseif [<sidebarWidthPercentage>!is[blank]!match[]] %>

					<$let viewportWidth={{$:/state/DynaView/ViewportDimensions/Width}} containerWidth={{{ [<viewportWidth>!is[blank]subtract<leftbarWidth>] ~[<containerWidth>] }}}>

						<$set name="sidebarWidthPercentage" value={{{ [<containerWidth>divide[100]multiply<sidebarWidthPercentage>] }}}>

							<$let originalStoryContainerWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<sidebarWidthPercentage>] }}} originalSingleColumnWidth={{{ [<originalStoryContainerWidth>divide<columnCount>] }}} sidebarResizerWidth={{{ [<selectednodeWidth>divide[2]] }}} gripDiff={{{ [<sidebarResizerWidth>subtract<drag-diff>] }}} minStoryContainerWidth={{{ [<minStoryWidth>multiply<columnCount>] }}} sidebarWidthMax={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<minStoryContainerWidth>] }}} sidebarWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract{$:/state/sidebar/posx}add<gripDiff>compare:number:lteq<sidebarWidthPercentage>then<sidebarWidthPercentage>] ~[<containerWidth>subtract{$:/state/sidebar/posx}add<gripDiff>compare:number:gteq<sidebarWidthMax>then<sidebarWidthMax>] ~[<containerWidth>subtract{$:/state/sidebar/posx}add<gripDiff>] }}} maxStoryContainerWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<sidebarWidthPercentage>] }}} storyContainerWidth={{{ [<containerWidth>subtract<sidebarWidth>compare:number:gteq<minStoryContainerWidth>] ~[<minStoryContainerWidth>] }}} singleColumnWidth={{{ [<storyContainerWidth>divide<columnCount>compare:number:gt<minStoryWidth>] ~[<minStoryWidth>] }}} narrowWidthWhenSidebarShown={{{ [<originalStoryContainerWidth>divide{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar}compare:number:gteq<minStoryWidth>] ~[<minStoryWidth>multiply{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar}divide<columnCount>] }}}>

								<%if [<singleColumnWidth>compare:number:lteq<narrowWidthWhenSidebarShown>] %>

									.tc-tiddler-controls > button:not(.tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow) {
										display: none;
									}

									.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
										display: block;
									}

								<% endif %>

							</$let>

						</$set>

					</$let>

				<% endif %>

			</$vars>

		<% endif %>

	}

	@media (max-width: 991.98px) {

		.tc-tiddler-controls >  button:not(.tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow) {
			display: none;
		}

		.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
			display: block;
		}

	}

<% else %>

	.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-tiddlyflex-shown-when-narrow {
		display: none;
	}

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/misc.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/misc
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/misc.text:
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-sidebar .tc-sidebar-header {
		transition: none;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar .tc-show-sidebar-btn svg.tc-image-chevron-left, .tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar .tc-hide-sidebar-btn svg.tc-image-chevron-right {
		transform: none;
	}

	.tc-modal-wrapper {
		z-index: 999;
	}

	.tc-plugin-reload-warning {
		position: relative;
		padding-top: 15px;
		padding-bottom: 15px;
	}

	.tc-plugin-reload-warning p {
		margin: 0;
	}

	.tc-drafts-list.tc-tiddlyflex-drafts-list {
		z-index: 997;
		position: absolute;
		font-size: 0.8em;
		left: 0;
		bottom: 0;
	}

	<%if [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/show-controls-hover}match[yes]] %>

		@media (min-width: 992px) {

			.tc-tiddler-frame .tc-tiddler-controls {
				display: none;
				padding: 0;
			}

			.tc-tiddler-frame:hover .tc-tiddler-controls {
				display: block;
			}

		}

	<% endif %>

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/narrow.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/narrow

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/scroll-.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/scroll-margins
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/scroll-.text:
\procedure tiddlyflex-scroll-margin-top-story-river-padding()
\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock whitespace

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-{{{ [[$(tiddlyFlexColumn)$]substitute[]] }}} .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > [data-tiddler-title={{{ [[$(cssEscapedTitle)$]substitute[]addprefix["]addsuffix["]] }}}].tc-tiddler-view-frame, .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-{{{ [[$(tiddlyFlexColumn)$]substitute[]] }}} .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > [data-tiddler-title={{{ [[$(cssEscapedTitle)$]substitute[]addprefix["]addsuffix["]] }}}].tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
	scroll-margin-top: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}};
	scroll-margin-left: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}};
}

\end

\procedure tiddlyflex-scroll-margin-top()
\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock whitespace

.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-{{{ [[$(tiddlyFlexColumn)$]substitute[]] }}} .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > [data-tiddler-title={{{ [[$(cssEscapedTitle)$]substitute[]addprefix["]addsuffix["]] }}}].tc-tiddler-view-frame, .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-{{{ [[$(tiddlyFlexColumn)$]substitute[]] }}} .tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > [data-tiddler-title={{{ [[$(cssEscapedTitle)$]substitute[]addprefix["]addsuffix["]] }}}].tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
	scroll-margin-top: {{{ [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/margin-bottom}compare:number:lteq{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}] ~[{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}] }}};
	scroll-margin-left: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}};
}

\end

<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	<%if [[$:/state/sidebar/resizing]is[missing]] %>

		<$list filter="[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>]" variable="tiddlyFlexColumn">

			<$set name="tv-story-list" value={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<tiddlyFlexColumn>] }}}>

				<$list filter="[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[nth[1]]" variable="tiddler">

					<$set name="cssEscapedTitle" value={{{ [<tiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>

						<<tiddlyflex-scroll-margin-top-story-river-padding>>

					</$set>

				</$list>

				<$list filter="[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] -[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>nth[1]]" variable="tiddler">

					<$set name="cssEscapedTitle" value={{{ [<tiddler>escapecss[]] }}}>

						<<tiddlyflex-scroll-margin-top>>

					</$set>

				</$list>

			</$set>

		</$list>

	<% endif %>

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/setting.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/settings

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/sidebar.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/sidebar-resizer
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/sidebar.text:
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	@media (min-width: 992px) {

		.tc-sidebar-resizer-tiddlyflex {
			position: absolute;
			top: calc(50% - 26px);
			left: -39px;
			height: 26px;
			width: 52px;
			border-radius: 26px 26px 0 0;
			transform: rotate(-90deg);
			background-color: <<colour tiddlyflex-sidebar-resizer>>;
			z-index: 1002;
		}

	}

	@media (max-width: 991.98px) {

		.tc-sidebar-resizer-tiddlyflex {
			display: none;
		}

	}

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/tiddler.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/tiddler-animations

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/toolbar.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/toolbars
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/toolbar.text:
<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar {
		display: flex;
		align-items: stretch;
		line-height: 2em;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar .tc-sidebar-lists.tc-sidebar-search {
		line-height: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight}};
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar .tc-sidebar-lists.tc-sidebar-search .tc-block-dropdown {
		color: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar .tc-sidebar-lists.tc-sidebar-search .tc-search > .tc-reveal {
		font-size: 0.75rem;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar p {
		margin: 0;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-left, .tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-right {
		flex-grow: 0;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-center {
		flex-grow: 1;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-left {
		margin-top: 5px;
		margin-bottom: 5px;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-left > div:first-of-type {
		margin-left: {{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding}};
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-right button {
		margin-right: 0.5em;
		vertical-align: bottom;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-right .tc-btn-invisible svg:not(.lucide) {
		font-size: 1rem;
		height: 1rem;
		width: 1rem;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-right .tc-btn-invisible:hover svg:not(.lucide), .tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-right .tc-btn-invisible.tc-selected svg:not(.lucide) {
		fill: <<colour foreground>>;
	}

	.tc-tiddlyflex-top-toolbar-right .tc-btn-invisible.tc-selected {
		-webkit-filter: drop-shadow(0px -1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.25));
		-moz-filter: drop-shadow(0px -1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.25));
		filter: drop-shadow(0px -1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.25));
	}

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/z-index.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/z-indexes
$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/styles/z-index.text:
\procedure tiddlyflex-tiddler-z-indexes-inner()

<$list filter="[range<storyListCount>]">
`.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-`{{{ [[$(tiddlyFlexColumn)$]substitute[]] }}} `.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > .tc-tiddler-view-frame:nth-child(100n+`<$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/>`) > .tc-tiddler-frame`,
`.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-`{{{ [[$(tiddlyFlexColumn)$]substitute[]] }}} `.tc-tiddlyflex-story-river-inner > .tc-tiddler-edit-frame:nth-child(100n+`<$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/>`) > .tc-tiddler-frame {
z-index: `<$text text={{{ [<storyListCount>add[501]subtract<currentTiddler>] }}}/>`;
}
`
</$list>

\end

\procedure tiddlyflex-tiddler-z-indexes()

<$set name="storyListCount" value={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[count[]] }}}>

	<<tiddlyflex-tiddler-z-indexes-inner>>

</$set>

\end

<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-layout[]] %>

	<%if [{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles}match[yes]] %>

		<$list filter="[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>]" variable="tiddlyFlexColumn">

			<$set name="tv-story-list" value={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<tiddlyFlexColumn>] }}}>

				<<tiddlyflex-tiddler-z-indexes>>

			</$set>

		</$list>

	<% endif %>

<% endif %>

$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/globals/dragnd.text:
\procedure tiddlyflex-top-dragenter-actions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" drag-count={{{ [[$:/state/dragging]get[drag-count]add[1]] }}}/>
<%if [[$:/state/dragging]has[dragenter-count]] %>
 	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" starting-next-tiddler="" copying="" target=<<currentTiddler>> margin="top" nth={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]] }}} river=<<tiddlyFlexColumn>> next-tiddler="" from-index={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]] }}} from-story=<<tv-story-list>> dragenter-count={{{ [[$:/state/dragging]get[dragenter-count]add[1]] }}}/>
<% else %>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" dragenter-count="1"/>
<% endif %>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-bottom-dragenter-actions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" drag-count={{{ [[$:/state/dragging]get[drag-count]add[1]] }}}/>
<%if [[$:/state/dragging]has[dragenter-count]] %>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" starting-next-tiddler="" copying="" target=<<currentTiddler>> margin="bottom" nth={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]add[1]] }}} river=<<tiddlyFlexColumn>> next-tiddler="" from-index={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]add[1]] }}} from-story=<<tv-story-list>> dragenter-count={{{ [[$:/state/dragging]get[dragenter-count]add[1]] }}}/>
<% else %>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" dragenter-count="1"/>
<% endif %>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-top-drop-actions-inner()
<%if [<actionTiddler>!match<currentTiddler>] %>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<currentTiddler>]"/>
	<%if [<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]match[]] [<tv-history-list>!has[current-tiddler]] +[limit[1]] %>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler=<<actionTiddler>>/>
	<% endif %>
<% else %>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled"/><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/dragging"/>
<% endif %>
<$vars fromStoryList={{$:/state/dragging!!starting-from-story}} fromHistoryList={{$:/state/dragging!!from-history}}>
	<%if [<fromStoryList>!match<tv-story-list>] %>
		<%if [{$:/state/dragging!!is-focused-tiddler}match[TRUE]] %>
			<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<fromHistoryList>> current-tiddler={{{ [list<fromStoryList>zth{$:/state/dragging!!starting-from-index}] }}}/>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
</$vars>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-top-drop-actions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled" text="yes"/>
<$vars prefix="[[" suffix="]]">
	<%if [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] %>
		<$set name="actionTiddler" value={{{ [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] }}}>
			<<tiddlyflex-top-drop-actions-inner>>
		</$set>
	<% else %>
		<<tiddlyflex-top-drop-actions-inner>>
	<% endif %>
</$vars>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-bottom-drop-actions-inner()
<$set name="nextTiddler" value={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<currentTiddler>] }}}>
	<%if [<nextTiddler>match[]] %>
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="[<actionTiddler>]"/>
		<$list filter="[<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]match[]] [<tv-history-list>!has[current-tiddler]] +[limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
			<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler=<<actionTiddler>>/>
		</$list>
	<% else %>
		<%if [<actionTiddler>!match<nextTiddler>] %>
			<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<nextTiddler>]"/>
			<$list filter="[<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]match[]] [<tv-history-list>!has[current-tiddler]] +[limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
				<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tv-history-list>> current-tiddler=<<actionTiddler>>/>
			</$list>
		<% else %>
			<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled"/><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/dragging"/>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
</$set>
<$vars fromStoryList={{$:/state/dragging!!starting-from-story}} fromHistoryList={{$:/state/dragging!!from-history}}>
	<%if [<fromStoryList>!match<tv-story-list>] %>
		<%if [{$:/state/dragging!!is-focused-tiddler}match[TRUE]] %>
			<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<fromHistoryList>> current-tiddler={{{ [list<fromStoryList>zth{$:/state/dragging!!starting-from-index}] }}}/>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
</$vars>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-bottom-drop-actions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled" text="yes"/>
<$vars prefix="[[" suffix="]]">
	<%if [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] %>
		<$set name="actionTiddler" value={{{ [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] }}}>
			<<tiddlyflex-bottom-drop-actions-inner>>
		</$set>
	<% else %>
		<<tiddlyflex-bottom-drop-actions-inner>>
	<% endif %>
</$vars>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-drag-start-actions()
<$let nth={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]] }}} storyListLength={{{ [list<tv-story-list>count[]subtract[1]] }}}>
	<%if [<nth>match<storyListLength>] %>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" starting-before-tiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>before<currentTiddler>] }}}/>
	<% endif %>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging"
		drag-count="0"
		nth=<<nth>>
		height=<<tv-selectednode-height>>
		width=<<tv-selectednode-width>>
		start-river=<<tiddlyFlexColumn>>
		starting-next-tiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<currentTiddler>] }}}
		starting-from-index={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]] }}}
		starting-from-story=<<tv-story-list>>
	/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging"
		drag-tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>
		next-tiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<currentTiddler>] }}}
		from-index={{{ [list<tv-story-list>allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]] }}}
		from-story=<<tv-story-list>>
		from-history=<<tv-history-list>>
		is-focused-tiddler={{{ [<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]match<currentTiddler>then[TRUE]] ~[[FALSE]] }}}
		target={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<currentTiddler>] }}}
	/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" text="yes"/>
	<%if [<modifier>!match[ctrl]] %>
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="-[<currentTiddler>]"/>
	<% else %>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" copying="yes"/>
	<% endif %>
</$let>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-drag-end-actions()
<%if [[$:/state/drag-handled]is[missing]] %>
	<$let fromStoryList={{$:/state/dragging!!starting-from-story}} fromIndex={{$:/state/dragging!!starting-from-index}} listBeforeTiddler={{{ [list<fromStoryList>zth<fromIndex>] }}} prefix="[[" suffix="]]" actionTiddler={{{ [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] :else[<actionTiddler>] }}}>
		<%if [<listBeforeTiddler>!is[blank]] %>
			<$action-listops $tiddler=<<fromStoryList>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<listBeforeTiddler>]"/>
		<% else %>
			<$action-listops $tiddler=<<fromStoryList>> $subfilter="[<actionTiddler>]"/>
		<% endif %>
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled"/>
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/dragging"/>
	</$let>
<% else %>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled"/>
<% endif %>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-story-droppable-drop-actions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/drag-handled" text="yes"/>
<$vars prefix="[[" suffix="]]">
	<%if [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] %>
		<$set name="actionTiddler" value={{{ [<actionTiddler>removeprefix<prefix>removesuffix<suffix>] }}}>
			<%if [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] +[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>then[no]else[yes]!match[no]] %>
				<$set name="firstStoryTiddler" value={{{ [list<tv-story-list>nth[1]] }}}>
					<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<firstStoryTiddler>]"/>
				</$set>
			<% elseif [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>
				<$let lastShownTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[last[]] }}} insertBeforeTiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<lastShownTiddler>] }}}>
					<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<insertBeforeTiddler>]"/>
				</$let>
			<% else %>
				<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="[<actionTiddler>]"/>
			<% endif %>
		</$set>
	<% else %>
		<%if [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>then[no]else[yes]!match[no]] %>
			<$set name="firstStoryTiddler" value={{{ [list<tv-story-list>nth[1]] }}}>
				<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<firstStoryTiddler>]"/>
			</$set>
		<% elseif [{$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/filter}match[yes]] %>
			<$let lastShownTiddler={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-story-river-filter>] +[last[]] }}} insertBeforeTiddler={{{ [list<tv-story-list>after<lastShownTiddler>] }}}>
				<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertbefore<actionTiddler>,<insertBeforeTiddler>]"/>
			</$let>
		<% else %>
			<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="[<actionTiddler>]"/>
		<% endif %>
	<% endif %>
</$vars>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-story-droppable-dragenter-actions()
<%if [[$:/state/dragging]get[dragenter-count]] %>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" target="" starting-next-tiddler="" copying=""/>
<% else %>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/dragging" dragenter-count="1"/>
<% endif %>
\end

\procedure tiddlyflex-tm-message-navigator(actions)
<$navigator story=<<tv-story-list>> history=<<tv-history-list>> openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
	<<actions>>
</$navigator>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-tm-message-navigator-outside(actions)
<$navigator story={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>] :intersection[{$:/columns!!current-column}] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-current-column-filtered>] :map[addprefix[$:/StoryList-]] }}} history={{{ [subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-enlist-columns>] :intersection[{$:/columns!!current-column}] ~[subfilter<tdff.tiddlyflex-current-column-filtered>] :map[addprefix[$:/HistoryList-]] }}} openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
	<<actions>>
</$navigator>
\end
\procedure tiddlyflex-tm-message-actions(message,exclude)
<$set name="storyTiddler" value=<<event-navigateFromTitle>>>
	<$action-sendmessage
		$message=<<event-type>>
		$param={{{ [<event-param>!is[blank]!match[]] ~[<event-type>!match[tm-new-tiddler]then<event-tiddlerTitle>] }}}
		$navigateTo=<<event-navigateTo>>
		$navigateFromTitle=<<event-navigateFromTitle>>
		$navigateFromClientRect=<<event-navigateFromClientRect>>
		$navigateFromClientTop=<<event-navigateFromClientTop>>
		$navigateFromClientLeft=<<event-navigateFromClientLeft>>
		$navigateFromClientWidth=<<event-navigateFromClientWidth>>
		$navigateFromClientRight=<<event-navigateFromClientRight>>
		$navigateFromClientBottom=<<event-navigateFromClientBottom>>
		$navigateFromClientHeight=<<event-navigateFromClientHeight>>
		$navigateSuppressNavigation=<<event-navigateSuppressNavigation>>
		$names="[<list-event-paramObject>enlist-input[]]"
		$values="[<list-event-paramObject>enlist-input[]] :map:flat[addprefix[event-paramObject-]getvariable[]]"/>
</$set>
\end

<%if [tdff.tiddlyflex-fullscreen[]!is[blank]] %>
	<$vars from={{{ [<event-param>!is[blank]] ~[<event-tiddlerTitle>] }}} to={{{ [<event-param>!is[blank]get[draft.of]] ~[<event-tiddlerTitle>get[draft.of]]  }}}>
		<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-rename-tiddler" from={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<from>] }}} to={{{ [[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]addsuffix<to>] }}}/>

<% endif %>

	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="edit-missing-tiddlers" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/navigation/edit-missing-tiddlers}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="story-river-min-width" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/min-width}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="box-shadow-spread" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/box-shadow-spread}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="tiddler-controls-breakpoint" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="tiddler-controls-breakpoint-sidebar" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="follow-current-column" value={{{ [{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/follow-current-column}match[no]] ~yes }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="show-edit-preview-per-tiddler" value={{$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="show-controls-hover" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/show-controls-hover}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="animation-curve" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="story-river-padding" value={{{ [[$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding]get[text]] ~[[]] }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="tiddler-margin-bottom" value={{{ [[$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/margin-bottom]get[text]] ~[[]] }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="palette" value={{$:/palette}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field="show-top-right-bar" value={{$:/config/tiddlyflex/show-top-right-bar}}/>
	<$list filter="[list[$:/columns]]" variable="column">
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> field={{{ [[story-list-]addsuffix<column>] }}} value={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<column>get[list]] ~[[]] }}}/>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TopToolbar]!is[draft]]" variable="topToolbarTiddler">

	</$list>
	<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/BottomToolbar]!is[draft]]" variable="bottomToolbarTiddler">
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> $field="bottom-toolbar-tiddler" $subfilter="+[<bottomToolbarTiddler>]"/>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/LeftToolbar]!is[draft]]" variable="leftToolbarTiddler">
		<$action-listops $tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> $field="left-toolbar-tiddler" $subfilter="+[<leftToolbarTiddler>]"/>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/tags/AboveStoryHeader-]]" variable="aboveStoryHeaderTag">
		<$set name="index" value={{{ [<aboveStoryHeaderTag>removeprefix[$:/tags/AboveStoryHeader-]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<aboveStoryHeaderTag>!is[draft]]" variable="aboveStoryHeaderTiddler">
				<$vars field={{{ [[above-story-header-tiddler-]addsuffix<index>] }}} value=<<aboveStoryHeaderTiddler>>>
					<$action-listops $tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> $field=<<field>> $subfilter="+[<value>]"/>
				</$vars>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/tags/BelowStoryFooter-]]" variable="belowStoryFooterTag">
		<$set name="index" value={{{ [<belowStoryFooterTag>removeprefix[$:/tags/BelowStoryFooter-]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<belowStoryFooterTag>!is[draft]]" variable="belowStoryFooterTiddler">
				<$vars field={{{ [[below-story-footer-tiddler-]addsuffix<index>] }}} value=<<belowStoryFooterTiddler>>>
					<$action-listops $tiddler=<<ensembleTiddler>> $field=<<field>> $subfilter="+[<value>]"/>
				</$vars>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	</$list>
	<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/>
</$set>
\end

\procedure tiddlyflex-empty-ensemble-title-message()

\procedure tiddlyflex-overwrite-ensemble-message()
\whitespace trim
<$action-confirm $message=<<tiddlyflex-get-ensemble-overwrite-message>>>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{ [[$:/Ensemble/]addsuffix<ensembleTitle>] }}}/>

\procedure tiddlyflex-save-ensemble-actions(ensembleTitle,icon)
\whitespace trim
<%if [<ensembleTitle>!is[blank]!match[]] %>
	<%if [[$:/Ensemble/]addsuffix<ensembleTitle>is[missing]] %>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [[$:/Ensemble/]addsuffix<ensembleTitle>] }}} icon=<<icon>>/>
		<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-save-ensemble-actions-inner" ensembleTitle=<<ensembleTitle>>/>
	<% else %>
		<<tiddlyflex-overwrite-ensemble-message>>
	<% endif %>
<% else %>
	<<tiddlyflex-empty-ensemble-title-message>>
<% endif %>
\end

\procedure tiddlyflex-load-ensemble-actions()
\whitespace trim
<%if [<ensembleTiddler>!is[missing]] %>
	<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/StoryList-]]" variable="storyList">
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<storyList>>/>
	</$list>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/layout" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[layout]] ~$:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex/ui/Layout }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/view" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[view]] ~tiddlyflex }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[sidebar-state]] ~yes }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/columns" field="list" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[columns]] ~1 }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/columns" field="current-column" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[current-column]] ~1 }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/horizontal" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[horizontal]] ~no }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[show-edit-preview-per-tiddler]] ~yes }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/show-controls-hover" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[show-controls-hover]] ~no }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/animation-curve" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[animation-curve]] ~linear }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/padding" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[story-river-padding]] ~42px }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/sidebar/width" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[sidebar-width]] ~15% }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/dragndrop/AnimationDuration" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[drag-drop-animation-duration]] ~175 }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/navigation/edit-missing-tiddlers" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[edit-missing-tiddlers]] ~no }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/min-width" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[story-river-min-width]] ~300px }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/box-shadow-spread" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[box-shadow-spread]] ~4px }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[tiddler-controls-breakpoint]] ~4 }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/controls-breakpoint-sidebar" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[tiddler-controls-breakpoint-sidebar]] ~3 }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/tiddler/margin-bottom" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[tiddler-margin-bottom]] ~28px }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/story-river/follow-current-column" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[follow-current-column]] ~yes }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/palette" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[palette]] ~$:/palettes/Vanilla }}}/>
	<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler="$:/config/tiddlyflex/show-top-right-bar" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[show-top-right-bar]] ~no }}}/>
	<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/Ensemble/]]" variable="ensembleTiddler">
		<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[stylesheets]] %>
			<$set name="stylesheetsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[stylesheets]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[enlist<stylesheetsList>]" variable="stylesheetTiddler">
					<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<stylesheetTiddler>>>
						<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>
					</$fieldmangler>
				</$list>
			</$set>
		<% endif %>
		<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[top-toolbar-tiddler]] %>
			<$set name="topbarsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[top-toolbar-tiddler]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[enlist<topbarsList>]" variable="topbarTiddler">
					<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<topbarTiddler>>>
						<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="$:/tags/TopToolbar"/>
					</$fieldmangler>
				</$list>
			</$set>
		<% endif %>
		<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[left-toolbar-tiddler]] %>
			<$set name="leftbarsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[left-toolbar-tiddler]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[enlist<leftbarsList>]" variable="leftbarTiddler">
					<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<leftbarTiddler>>>
						<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="$:/tags/LeftToolbar"/>
					</$fieldmangler>
				</$list>
			</$set>
		<% endif %>
		<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[bottom-toolbar-tiddler]] %>
			<$set name="bottombarsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[bottom-toolbar-tiddler]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[enlist<bottombarsList>]" variable="bottombarTiddler">
					<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<bottombarTiddler>>>
						<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="$:/tags/BottomToolbar"/>
					</$fieldmangler>
				</$list>
			</$set>
		<% endif %>
		<$list filter="[<ensembleTiddler>fields[]prefix[above-story-header-tiddler-]]" variable="aboveStoryHeaderField">
			<$vars aboveStoryHeaderList={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get<aboveStoryHeaderField>] }}} index={{{ [<aboveStoryHeaderField>removeprefix[above-story-header-tiddler-]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[enlist<aboveStoryHeaderList>]" variable="aboveStoryHeaderTiddler">
					<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<aboveStoryHeaderTiddler>>>
						<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param={{{ [[$:/tags/AboveStoryHeader-]addsuffix<index>] }}}/>
					</$fieldmangler>
				</$list>
			</$vars>
		</$list>
		<$list filter="[<ensembleTiddler>fields[]prefix[below-story-footer-tiddler-]]" variable="belowStoryFooterField">
			<$vars belowStoryFooterList={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get<belowStoryFooterField>] }}} index={{{ [<belowStoryFooterField>removeprefix[below-story-footer-tiddler-]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[enlist<belowStoryFooterList>]" variable="belowStoryFooterTiddler">
					<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<belowStoryFooterTiddler>>>
						<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param={{{ [[$:/tags/BelowStoryFooter-]addsuffix<index>] }}}/>
					</$fieldmangler>
				</$list>
			</$vars>
		</$list>
	</$list>
	<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[stylesheets]] %>
		<$set name="stylesheetsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[stylesheets]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<stylesheetsList>]" variable="stylesheetTiddler">
				<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<stylesheetTiddler>>>
					<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>
				</$fieldmangler>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	<% endif %>
	<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[top-toolbar-tiddler]] %>
		<$set name="topbarsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[top-toolbar-tiddler]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<topbarsList>]" variable="topbarTiddler">
				<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<topbarTiddler>>>
					<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="$:/tags/TopToolbar"/>
				</$fieldmangler>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	<% endif %>
	<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[bottom-toolbar-tiddler]] %>
		<$set name="bottombarsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[bottom-toolbar-tiddler]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<bottombarsList>]" variable="bottombarTiddler">
				<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<bottombarTiddler>>>
					<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="$:/tags/BottomToolbar"/>
				</$fieldmangler>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	<% endif %>
	<%if [<ensembleTiddler>has[left-toolbar-tiddler]] %>
		<$set name="leftbarsList" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get[left-toolbar-tiddler]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<leftbarsList>]" variable="leftbarTiddler">
				<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<leftbarTiddler>>>
					<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="$:/tags/LeftToolbar"/>
				</$fieldmangler>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	<% endif %>
	<$list filter="[<ensembleTiddler>fields[]prefix[above-story-header-tiddler-]]" variable="aboveStoryHeaderField">
		<$let aboveStoryHeaderList={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get<aboveStoryHeaderField>] }}} index={{{ [<aboveStoryHeaderField>removeprefix[above-story-header-tiddler-]] }}} aboveStoryHeaderTag={{{ [[$:/tags/AboveStoryHeader-]addsuffix<index>] }}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<aboveStoryHeaderList>]" variable="aboveStoryHeaderTiddler">
				<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<aboveStoryHeaderTiddler>>>
					<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param=<<aboveStoryHeaderTag>>/>
				</$fieldmangler>
			</$list>
		</$let>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[<ensembleTiddler>fields[]prefix[below-story-footer-tiddler-]]" variable="belowStoryFooterField">
		<$let belowStoryFooterList={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get<belowStoryFooterField>] }}} index={{{ [<belowStoryFooterField>removeprefix[below-story-footer-tiddler-]] }}} belowStoryFooterTag={{{ [[$:/tags/BelowStoryFooter-]addsuffix<index>] }}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<belowStoryFooterList>]" variable="belowStoryFooterTiddler">
				<$fieldmangler tiddler=<<belowStoryFooterTiddler>>>
					<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param=<<belowStoryFooterTag>>/>
				</$fieldmangler>
			</$list>
		</$let>
	</$list>
	<$list filter="[<ensembleTiddler>fields[]prefix[story-list-]]" variable="storyField">
		<$let storyNumber={{{ [<storyField>removeprefix[story-list-]] }}} storyTitle={{{ [[$:/StoryList-]addsuffix<storyNumber>] }}}>
			<$macrocall $name="tiddlyflex-set-ensemble-configuration" tiddler=<<storyTitle>> field="list" value={{{ [<ensembleTiddler>get<storyField>] }}}/>
		</$let>
	</$list>
	<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[all[tiddlers]prefix[$:/state/tiddlyflex/story-river/fullscreen/]]"/>
<% endif %>
\end

\procedure tiddlyflex-ensemble(title)

</$set>
\end

<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" text="" default="" state=<> class="tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfoSegment]!has[draft.of]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
